species.name: Human
species.description: Humans are adaptable and versatile, thriving in various environments and excelling in diverse pursuits.

species_traits.abilityScoreIncrease: You can increase one ability score of your choice by 1.
languages: One additional language of your choice

species.name: Elf
species.description: Elves are graceful and attuned to magic and nature, known for their longevity and keen senses.

subspecies.name: High Elf
subspecies.description: High Elves are scholars and spellcasters with an innate knack for magic.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Increase Intelligence by 1.

traits.name: Cantrips
traits.description: You know one cantrip of your choice from the wizard spell list.

subspecies.name: Wood Elf
subspecies.description: Wood Elves are agile hunters who feel at home in forested terrains.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Increase Wisdom by 1.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your speed is 35.

subspecies.name: Dark Elf (Drow)
subspecies.description: Dark Elves dwell in the Underdark and have a unique connection to magic and shadows.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Increase Charisma by 1.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light.

species.name: Dwarf
species.description: Dwarves are strong and resilient, skilled in crafting and enduring hardship.

subspecies.name: Hill Dwarf
subspecies.description: Hill Dwarves are known for their resilience and deep-rooted connection to nature.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Increase Wisdom by 1.

traits.name: Hit Points
traits.description: You gain an additional hit point at each level.

subspecies.name: Mountain Dwarf
subspecies.description: Mountain Dwarves are skilled warriors, accustomed to rugged terrains.

traits.name: Armor Proficiency
traits.description: You gain proficiency with light and medium armor.

species.name: Dragonborn
species.description: Dragonborn are proud and noble beings, descended from dragons. Their ancestry grants them unique abilities tied to their draconic heritage.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Increase Strength by 2 and Charisma by 1.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Medium

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: Common, Draconic

subspecies.name: Chromatic Dragonborn
subspecies.description: Dragonborn descended from chromatic dragons, known for their destructive breath and resilience.

variants.name: Black Dragonborn
variants.description: Descendants of black dragons, feared for their acid breath.

traits.name: Breath Weapon
traits.description: Exhale a 5x30 ft line of acid (Dexterity save).

traits.name: Damage Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to acid damage.

variants.name: Blue Dragonborn
variants.description: Descendants of blue dragons, known for their mastery of lightning.

traits.name: Breath Weapon
traits.description: Exhale a 5x30 ft line of lightning (Dexterity save).

traits.name: Damage Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to lightning damage.

variants.name: Green Dragonborn
variants.description: Descendants of green dragons, feared for their toxic breath.

traits.name: Breath Weapon
traits.description: Exhale a 15 ft cone of poison (Constitution save).

traits.name: Damage Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to poison damage.

variants.name: Red Dragonborn
variants.description: Descendants of red dragons, embodying fiery destruction.

traits.name: Breath Weapon
traits.description: Exhale a 15 ft cone of fire (Dexterity save).

traits.name: Damage Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to fire damage.

variants.name: White Dragonborn
variants.description: Descendants of white dragons, attuned to the icy cold.

traits.name: Breath Weapon
traits.description: Exhale a 15 ft cone of cold (Constitution save).

traits.name: Damage Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to cold damage.

subspecies.name: Metallic Dragonborn
subspecies.description: Dragonborn descended from metallic dragons, often noble and protective.

variants.name: Brass Dragonborn
variants.description: Descendants of brass dragons, known for their fiery breath.

traits.name: Breath Weapon
traits.description: Exhale a 5x30 ft line of fire (Dexterity save).

traits.name: Damage Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to fire damage.

variants.name: Bronze Dragonborn
variants.description: Descendants of bronze dragons, adept in controlling lightning.

traits.name: Breath Weapon
traits.description: Exhale a 5x30 ft line of lightning (Dexterity save).

traits.name: Damage Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to lightning damage.

variants.name: Copper Dragonborn
variants.description: Descendants of copper dragons, known for their acidic breath.

traits.name: Breath Weapon
traits.description: Exhale a 5x30 ft line of acid (Dexterity save).

traits.name: Damage Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to acid damage.

variants.name: Gold Dragonborn
variants.description: Descendants of gold dragons, embodying fiery power and nobility.

traits.name: Breath Weapon
traits.description: Exhale a 15 ft cone of fire (Dexterity save).

traits.name: Damage Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to fire damage.

variants.name: Silver Dragonborn
variants.description: Descendants of silver dragons, attuned to the frigid cold.

traits.name: Breath Weapon
traits.description: Exhale a 15 ft cone of cold (Constitution save).

traits.name: Damage Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to cold damage.

subspecies.name: Gem Dragonborn
subspecies.description: Dragonborn descended from gem dragons, exhibiting psionic abilities and radiant breath.

variants.name: Amethyst Dragonborn
variants.description: Descendants of amethyst dragons, wielding forceful breath attacks.

traits.name: Breath Weapon
traits.description: Exhale a 15 ft cone of force damage (Dexterity save).

traits.name: Damage Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to force damage.

variants.name: Crystal Dragonborn
variants.description: Descendants of crystal dragons, radiant and protective.

traits.name: Breath Weapon
traits.description: Exhale a 15 ft cone of radiant damage (Constitution save).

traits.name: Damage Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to radiant damage.

variants.name: Emerald Dragonborn
variants.description: Descendants of emerald dragons, emitting psychic power.

traits.name: Breath Weapon
traits.description: Exhale a 15 ft cone of psychic damage (Constitution save).

traits.name: Damage Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to psychic damage.

variants.name: Sapphire Dragonborn
variants.description: Descendants of sapphire dragons, resonating with thunder.

traits.name: Breath Weapon
traits.description: Exhale a 15 ft cone of thunder damage (Dexterity save).

traits.name: Damage Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to thunder damage.

variants.name: Topaz Dragonborn
variants.description: Descendants of topaz dragons, exuding necrotic energy.

traits.name: Breath Weapon
traits.description: Exhale a 15 ft cone of necrotic damage (Constitution save).

traits.name: Damage Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to necrotic damage.

species.name: Halfling
species.description: Halflings are small and nimble, known for their luck and resourcefulness.

subspecies.name: Lightfoot Halfling
subspecies.description: Lightfoot Halflings are stealthy and charismatic.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Increase Charisma by 1.

traits.name: Stealth
traits.description: You can attempt to hide even when obscured by a creature larger than you.

subspecies.name: Stout Halfling
subspecies.description: Stout Halflings are hardier and more resilient than their Lightfoot kin.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Increase Constitution by 1.

traits.name: Resilience
traits.description: You have advantage on saving throws against poison.

species.name: Tiefling
species.description: Tieflings are individuals with infernal heritage, marked by their fiendish blood.

species_traits.abilityScoreIncrease: Increase Charisma by 2 and Intelligence by 1.

subspecies.name: Infernal Tiefling
subspecies.description: Tieflings with a connection to the Nine Hells, gaining unique spells and resistances.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light.

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.description: You know the Thaumaturgy cantrip.

subspecies.name: Abyssal Tiefling
subspecies.description: Tieflings connected to the Abyss, marked by chaotic energy.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light.

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.description: You know the Eldritch Blast cantrip.

species.name: Gnome
species.description: Gnomes are small, clever, and inventive, often with a deep connection to the earth.

subspecies.name: Forest Gnome
subspecies.description: Forest Gnomes are attuned to nature and often live in wooded areas.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Increase Dexterity by 1.

traits.name: Natural Illusionist
traits.description: You know the Minor Illusion cantrip.

subspecies.name: Rock Gnome
subspecies.description: Rock Gnomes are known for their inventiveness and craftsmanship.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Increase Constitution by 1.

traits.name: Artificer's Lore
traits.description: You have proficiency with artisan's tools.

species.name: Orc
species.description: Orcs are fierce and strong, often living in tribal societies.

species_traits.abilityScoreIncrease: Increase Strength by 2 and Constitution by 1.

species.name: Goliath
species.description: Towering over most folk, goliaths are distant descendants of giants, known for their supernatural boons tied to their giant heritage.

species_traits.abilityScoreIncrease: Increase Strength by 2 and Constitution by 1.
species_traits.mountainBorn: You’re acclimated to high altitudes, including elevations above 20,000 feet, and you’re naturally adapted to cold climates.
species_traits.stone’sEndurance: As a reaction, reduce damage taken by 1d12 + Constitution modifier once per short rest.

subspecies.name: Stone Goliath
subspecies.description: Goliaths connected to the resilience of stone, renowned for their endurance and strength.

traits.name: Stone's Endurance
traits.description: As a reaction, reduce damage dealt to you by 1d12 + Constitution modifier.

subspecies.name: Ice Goliath
subspecies.description: Goliaths tied to the cold of their mountain homes, excelling in icy terrains and enduring freezing conditions.

traits.name: Cold Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to cold damage.

traits.name: Ice Climber
traits.description: You have advantage on Athletics checks related to climbing icy surfaces.

subspecies.name: Storm Goliath
subspecies.description: Goliaths infused with the power of storms, capable of wielding thunderous strength and resilience.

traits.name: Storm's Thunder
traits.description: As a reaction, deal 1d8 thunder damage to a creature within 60 feet when damaged by it.

traits.name: Thunder Strike
traits.description: When you hit with a melee attack, deal an additional 1d6 thunder damage. Usable once per short rest.

subspecies.name: Fire Goliath
subspecies.description: Goliaths attuned to volcanic regions, harnessing fiery resilience and destructive power.

traits.name: Fire Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to fire damage.

traits.name: Fires burn
traits.description: When a creature hits you with a melee attack, it takes fire damage equal to your proficiency bonus.
